text: (viśvāsavantayini!) dharmaya himi ayagen niyata vaśayenma (mevænnanda) samaharek siṭinnāha. ovun allāhvada, obaṭa pahaḷa karana lada (mema) dharmayada, ovunṭa pahaḷa karana lada (anit) dæyada, viśvāsa kara, allāhṭada biyavī kaṭayutu karannāha. ovun allāhgē āyāvan dī suḷu mudalak labā gannēda næta. mevænnanṭa ovungē phalavipāka ovungē deviyan vetin (imahat vū dæya vaśayen) ættēya. niyata vaśayenma allāh (ovungē) gaṇanaya bælīmehi itāmat tīvravantayeku vannēya
